topics.body:
Mad max spoilers(?)
[spoiler]You know it occurred to me that  furiosa mentions she was taken away from the many mothers over 7000 days prior.  unless she was exaggerating that means it had been 20 years since she was taken by the war boys. That means things went sour in the world more than 20 years prior. it really makes it really apparent the role of max was written for Mel Gibson before he went crazy since Tom hardy's max is way too young to have been around to be a cop before things went bad.[/spoiler]

topics.body:
Well I just read the dumbest thing today.


There's a franchise called Kantai Collection where they turn WWII battleships into moe girls who can walk on water.

Well anyways, one of the criticisms towards the anime, besides the fact they removed the romance from a fricking romance and as a result the character they choose for the main character is the blandest thing imaginable and completely uninteresting to any level at all, is that in the anime the moe girls win the battle of midway not being "realistic". . . . I think a couple people missed the part about it being moe girls that can run on water and whenever they fight it removes parts of their clothing without any actually severe injuries.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
